Articles.Content:
Company's goal is to provide only AAA+ production, according to principle: "if you doing something - then do it the right way, or don't start it at all".

.......

P.S. Projects "SCA", "UISS" and most others are terminated due to loss of relevance (significance). Sry for that.

Ha!
Pretty sure Quadro-san is still working on this, the last thing I heard from him about this mod (a week ago maybe?) was quite optimistic IIRC... However, this stuff takes a lot of time.
Just popping in to say that I'm glad I'm not the only one that uses 3DS Max.
I really hope that this does not die...

Don't panic. I just have to work on some big projects for other games with much bigger audience.

And as for this game, as Kreuzung said earlier - i've learned C# and already developed some advanced and unique technologies, for past months, which i hope i could use in practise.

Just popping in to say that I'm glad I'm not the only one that uses 3DS Max.

3DS Max is the most professional and superior 3d-soft, atm (along with Zbrush).

Edited July 5, 2013 by quadro7f

Don't panic. I just have to work on some big projects for other games with much bigger audience.

And as for this game, as Kreuzung said earlier - i've learned C# and already developed some advanced and unique technologies, for past months, which i hope i could use in practise.

3DS Max is the most professional and superior 3d-soft, atm (along with Zbrush).

Just want to state the obvious and say that you are the single most talented 3d artist that KSP has, and I am beyond excited to see your work in the future!

Just want to state the obvious and say that you are the single most talented 3d artist that KSP has, and I am beyond excited to see your work in the future!

Oh, thank you very much, sir!

Maybe this was mentioned before April 2013, but now that we have action groups it is possible to add the Vanguard eject part module to the command pod and select it in the Abort action group, so all of the crew will be thrown out of the hatch at the same time, instead of EVA-ing everyone separately.

Maybe this was mentioned before April 2013, but now that we have action groups it is possible to add the Vanguard eject part module to the command pod and select it in the Abort action group, so all of the crew will be thrown out of the hatch at the same time, instead of EVA-ing everyone separately.

I am working very close with Vanguard Technologies and personally with Kreuzung-san, so this is not a problem.

@quadro7f

Great to hear from you again! I will admit, despite what Kreuzung said about you not abandoning the project I had pretty much given up hope... though I did keep checking this thread, so there's that.

Welcome back.
Hi, what's happening with the Space Shuttle and all that cool stuff? Are you still working on it, honestly it was one of the best mods I have ever seen !!
I really wish someone would continue this mod
Wich texture Size you use on your models ?
